history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04168
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE CAMARINES SUR SPECIAL ECONOMIC ZONE IN THE PROVINCE OF CAMARINES SUR, CREATING FOR SUCH PURPOSE THE CAMARINES SUR SPECIAL ECONOMIC ZONE AUTHORITY, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:

      2. Transmitted to the Committee on Appropriations on 2018-01-31
